summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1493, for the improvement of the west side of 6th Avenue South from the south margin of Adams Street to the south margin of Oregon Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by constructing a 6 foot wood walks thereon, together with cross walks, under Ordinance No. 15963 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
